title: Menard Corr - staff records and time cards

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Names and badge numbers of all employees working during the time period of 5/10/2024 through 5/12/2024.
* Titles and positions of all employees working during the time period of 5/10/2024 through 5/12/2024.
* Time cards for all IID officers working at Menard CC during the time period of 5/10/2024 through 5/12/2024.
* Phone call recordings of internal (staff and/or employee) calls to/from PC visiting area on 5/10/2024 from 1130 hrs to 1400 hrs.
* Video recordings of inmate movement to/from PC visiting room (second floor) on 5/10/2024 from 0730 hrs to 1330 hrs.
* Logs of all officers who were in the PC visiting area (second floor) on 5/10/2024 from 0730 hrs to 1330 hrs.
* Video recordings of officer activity in the PC visiting area (second floor) on 5/10/2024 from 0730 hrs to 1330 hrs.
* Logs of all prisoners transported into and out of the PC visiting area (second floor) on 5/10/2024 from 0730 hrs to 1330 hrs AND all officers who transported them, including times.
* Report regarding visitor vehicle search conducted on 5/11/2024 around 0800 hrs at Menard CC, including officer names and badge numbers of those who participated.
* Video recording of visitor parking lot on 5/11/2024 from 0700 hrs to 0900 hrs.
* Guard tower (at visitor parking lot) logs from 5/11/2024.
* Audio recording of phone calls made to and from front gatehouse at Menard on 5/11/2024 from 0700 hrs to 1330 hrs.

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

title: IDOC - PREA reports (Menard and ALL facilities)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records and answers for the time period of June 2022 to June 2024.

* Number of PREA reports filed at ALL facilities (monthly and yearly).
* Number of PREA reports filed at Menard CC (monthly and yearly).
* Number of PREA reports at ALL facilities resolved in favor of complainant (monthly and yearly).
* Number of PREA reports at Menard CC resolved in favor of complainant (monthly and yearly).
* Number of PREA reports filed against IDOC employees or staff (monthly and yearly).
* Outcome of PREA reports investigations at Menard handled by your office (i.e., founded, unfounded, indictment) by month and year.
* Outcome of PREA reports at ALL facilities handled by your office (i.e., founded, unfounded, indictment) by month and year.
* Number of PREA reports resulting in disciplinary actions against Menard employees or staff (monthly and yearly).
* Number of PREA reports resulting in disciplinary actions against IDOC employees or staff at ALL facilities (monthly and yearly).
* Length of time for resolution of PREA reports at ALL facilities.
* Length of time for resolution of PREA reports at Menard.
* Number of PREA reports listed by facility, including types (monthly, yearly).
* List of any outside agencies consulted or collaborated with in investigation and/or resolution of PREA reports, including federal and state.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

title: IDOC - IID complaints (Menard and ALL facilities)

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: IDOC - IID complaints (Menard and ALL facilities)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records and answers for the time period of June 2022 to June 2024.

* Number of complaints filed regarding the Menard IDOC Internal Investigations Division (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints investigated regarding the Menard IDOC Internal Investigations Division (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints filed regarding IDOC Internal Investigations Division at ALL facilities (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints investigated regarding the IDOC Internal Investigations Division at ALL facilities (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints regarding the Menard IDOC Internal Investigations Division resolved in favor of complainant (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints regarding the IDOC Internal Investigations Division at ALL facilities resolved in favor of complainant (monthly and yearly).
* Number of complaints filed against each IID officer (i.e., officer badge #1238 had 12 complaints filed against him), according to month/year.
* Type of complaints submitted to your office, regarding the Menard IDOC Internal Investigation Division officers  (i.e., excessive force, theft, rape).
* Type of complaints submitted to your office, regarding the IDOC Internal Investigation Division officers at ALL facilities (i.e., excessive force, theft, rape).
* Outcome of IDOC Internal Investigations Division complaints at Menard handled by your office (i.e., founded, unfounded, indictment) by month and year.
* Outcome of IDOC Internal Investigations Division complaints at ALL facilities handled by your office (i.e., founded, unfounded, indictment) by month and year.
* Number of IDOC Internal Investigations Division complaints resulting in disciplinary actions against Menard IID officers (monthly and yearly).
* Number of IDOC Internal Investigations Division complaints resulting in disciplinary actions against IID officers at ALL facilities (monthly and yearly).
* Length of time for resolution of Menard IDOC Internal Investigation Division complaints sent to your office.
* Length of time for resolution of IDOC Internal Investigation Division complaints  at ALL facilities.
* Internal Investigation Division IDOC complaints by facility, including types (monthly, yearly).
* List of any outside agencies consulted or collaborated with in resolution of IDOC Internal Investigation Division complaints, including federal and state.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell
